#!/bin/bash
# Install updates and Python
sudo yum update -y
sudo amazon-linux-extras install python3.8 -y
sudo yum install -y python3-pip git

# Create app directory
mkdir -p /opt/pynecone-app
cd /opt/pynecone-app

# Clone your app repo (replace with your repo URL or use S3/CodeDeploy in production)
# git clone <your-repo-url> .

# For demonstration, create a placeholder main.py
cat <<EOF > main.py
print('Pynecone app placeholder')
EOF

# Install requirements (if requirements.txt is present)
# pip3 install -r requirements.txt

# Start the app (replace with actual start command)
# python3 main.py
